biotools.summary:
An Update on the Prediction of Kinase-specific Phosphorylation Sites in Proteins.

Kinase-specific Phosphorylation Site Prediction.

Computational prediction of phosphorylation sites (p-sites) with their cognate protein kinases (PKs) is greatly helpful for further experimental design.
